a21ns1g4ts/data-wizard

Extracts JSON from documents using LLMs

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Tool for creating, editing, and exporting fine-tuning datasets for LLMs with document processing and multiple export formats
  • Parses documents into JSON and Markdown
  • fixes broken JSON from LLMs in Python
  • Open-source JSON editor, visualizes JSON as interactive graphs, converts formats, validates, generates schema, executes queries
  • convert command-line tool output to JSON or YAML for scripts
  • extract structured data from any webpage using LLMs
  • Extracts structured data from Excel for LLM pipelines
  • convert JSON into a directory with files, symlinks, and scripts
  • Structured data extraction for LLMs
  • Prisma generator that converts schema.prisma to JSON Schema format
